refnamediv.refpurpose: Duplicate visual operations onto multiple visuals

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: Duplicates all drawing operations onto multiple `child' targets, thus producing identical output on multiple visuals.

refsect1.title: Options
refsect1.para: The argument to display-multi is a colon- (`:') separated list of target specs to draw on. Because target specs can (and often do) contain colons, they need to be enclosed in parentheses.
